Choose a plastic lid and cut off the rim.
(The part that attaches to the body of the container.)

Check out the faucet.

Determine how your tag
will fit on your faucet.

You may want to use a Sharpie
to trace a cup to create a guide
to cut out the center.

Cut a straight line from anywhere
on the perimeter to the edge
where your circle will begin.

Then cut around the circle until
you have the center of the plastic cut out.

Test it on the faucet it is
intended for to be sure
it fits and the
faucet is still usable.

Make any
adjustments necessary.

Cut the outside edge to create
whatever design you like.

Your tag can have any shape you choose
from round to scalloped edges.

Let creativity be your guide!
